title: Identify the base and exponent
text: To convert a logarithmic equation to exponential form, we need to identify the base of the exponential, a, and the exponent $$y$$ since $$y=\log_{a}\left(x\right)$$ is equivalent to $$x=a^y$$.
speech: To convert a logarithmic equation to exponential form, we need to identify the base of the exponential, a, and the exponent  y  since  y, is equal to, the log base a of x,  is equivalent to  x is equal to a to the y-th .
